categories: Category:Years in the inter-Sith Wars period

nodes.text: The following events took place in 3630 BBY.

In Chapter VIII: End Times of Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne, the player has to choose between saving Torian Cadera or Vette. In the Iokath expansion, the player has to choose to side with either the Sith Empire or the Galactic Republic, which would lead either to the death of Empress Acina or Jace Malcom.
